name: TheAtlantic
text: Jeff Sessions offers a revealing explanation for why many Christians support Donald Trump, writes @GrahamDavidA: https://t.co/Buht0HqRnn

name: TheAtlantic
text: "The driving factor for Trump’s collapse appears to be race," writes @GrahamDavidA: https://t.co/MWUBt9BdpD

name: TheAtlantic
text: At a certain point during the Queer Liberation March in New York City on Sunday, @skornhaber writes, the feeling became overwhelming: Pride should always be like this. https://t.co/14Kbff41Kg

name: TheAtlantic
text: The U.S. is again at risk of outstripping its COVID-19 testing capacity, and delays at testing providers are piling up, @alexismadrigal and @yayitsrob report. “The testing supply chain wasn’t meant for this kind of onslaught of volume,” an expert says. https://t.co/wPQ8qgQo4F

name: TheAtlantic
text: Intentional voter suppression and unintentional suppression of the vote will collide in November, @AdamHSays reports: https://t.co/iHgd93SQhv

name: TheAtlantic
text: "The events of recent weeks echo a previous low point of Trump’s presidency: his response to the violence and hate perpetrated by white-supremacist groups protesting the removal of a Robert E. Lee statue in Charlottesville, Virginia," @jonkarl writes: https://t.co/oOq4xTlTje

name: TheAtlantic
text: The idea of child care as women's (unpaid) work holds the issue back in political discussions. It's time we saw it as infrastructure, @helenlewis writes: https://t.co/xQzHABtp53

name: TheAtlantic
text:
RT @elainejgodfrey: "This was a journey straight into a mountainside, with countless missed opportunities to turn away. A system was in place to save lives and contain disaster. The people in charge of the system could not be bothered to avoid the doomed course."

https://t.co/i8MUCiN6MD
